name: Guilty Gear 20th Anniversary Edition
description:
~~CANCELED~~
Classic entries of the GUILTY GEAR series now back in the newest game console!
Also available as a 2-in-1 twin pack for Nintendo Switch!
Pioneer of the high-speed fighting game genre, "GUILTY GEAR", and the XX series final instalment, "GUILTY GEAR XX CORE PLUS R", now together as 1 pack!
